name: Double Pointed Needle Organizer - Lock & Key - MADE TO ORDER
description:
This item is MADE TO ORDER - Please allow up to 7 business days to ship What does "made to order" mean? We believe your needle organizer should be as beautiful as the project your tools create. It should also be affordable, functional, high quality, and handmade one at a time with attention to detail.
  • soft, 100% cotton fabrics, inside and out
  • interfaced with a layer of soft batting
    • provides durability and protection for your needles & tools!
  • made in the USA wooden toggles
    • no ties to fuss with or belts to fasten, just roll up and you're good to go!
  • 16 total pockets in 2 rows - 8 per row
  • the column on the end is a bit wider to accommodate a circ or two, all other pockets are 1" - 2" wide (2.54-5.08cm)
  • approximately 8.5" (21.59cm) tall x 13" (33.02cm) wide with the top folded down

*fabric placement will vary* *the organizer shown is similar to the one you will receive* *fits needles up to 8" (20.32cm)* *needles not included*

name: Knitting Crochet Project Clutch - Bandit - MADE TO ORDER
description:
This item is MADE TO ORDER - Please allow up to 7 business days to ship What does "made to order" mean? Sometimes the occasion calls for knitting (or crocheting) on-the-go. A wristlet-style project bag that is compact & secure is the perfect solution! Our handmade project clutches are awesome for toting around only what you need for the project you're working on. This project bag will hold one ball of yarn, some short needles and your work in progress. Great for socks, mitts, or other small projects! Perfect for commuters; just slip the loop onto your wrist, unzip the bag a bit, and knit/crochet on-the-go!
  • gusseted bottom
    • allows the bag to stand up on its own when packed
  • interfaced with soft fleece
    • offers more durability and protection for your projects!
  • coordinating wrist strap (approx. 9" (22.86cm) diameter)
    • allows you to secure your clutch on your wrist while working on your project!
  • zipper with ribbon pull
    • quickly & easily store away your project!
  • approximately 6.5" (16.51cm) tall, width at the top is 10" (25.4cm), width at the bottom is 8" (20.32cm)

*fabric placement & zipper/ribbon color will vary* *the project clutch shown is similar to the one you will receive* *yarn and needles not included*

name: Knitting Crochet Project Bag Square - Sittin Kitties
description:
We believe your knitting and crochet bag should be as beautiful as the project it holds. It should also be affordable, functional, high quality, and handmade one at a time with attention to detail. Our handmade project bags are super portable and very cute! Are they reversible? YES! This bag will hold a few skeins/balls of yarn, some short needles and notions. Keep it inside a bigger knitting bag so that your current project doesn't get tangled up with the rest or keep all your current projects separated in their own project bags!

    • flip it inside out for a new look, it's fun to change it up!
  • 100% cotton drawcords
    • absolutely NO polyester/nylon cheap slippery drawcords in our bags! - no snaps, no velcro to snag your yarn, nothing to get in your way - just cinch shut, and you're ready to go!
  • approximately 9" (22.86cm) tall
  • width at the top is 13" (33.02cm) when flat - base is a generous 6.5" (16.51cm) square
    • plenty of space for a small project bag!

*fabric placement will vary* *the project bag shown is similar to the one you will receive* *yarn and needles not included*

name: Pattern Wallet - *Deluxe* Full Size - Les Amis - MADE TO ORDER
description:
This item is MADE TO ORDER - Please allow up to 7 business days to ship What does "made to order" mean? Organizing shouldn't just be for needles & hooks! I wanted to keep my patterns neat & protected, while still easy to read. I was tired of my patterns becoming a wrinkled mess in my project bag - not any more! ~~This is a madbird original design!~~ These pattern wallets will hold paper in both US standard 8.5 x 11" and A4 with no resizing or folding necessary! This size pattern wallet is great for larger, more complicated patterns & charts. Our handmade pattern wallet/keepers have a large pocket "window" made of 12 gauge anti-glare vinyl so that you can view your pattern easily while keeping it protected on the go! No more crumpled up...and folded in fourths...patterns! No more rips. No loose papers floating around in your project bag!
  • folds in half and secures with a magnetic snap
    • portable and easy to close
  • fits US standard 8.5"x11" as well as A4
  • fold back and snap open to prop up for easy viewing!
  • full size zip pouch sewn right into the wallet
    • keep your notions tucked securely in here! PLENTY of space! Folds completely out of the way when wallet is in use, and into the wallet when closed.
  • interfaced with extra firm stabilizer
    • nice and sturdy, yet still soft
  • approximately 9.5"x12.25" (24.13cm x 31.12cm) when open, 9.5"x 6" (24.13cm x 15.24cm) when closed

*fabric placement/zipper color will vary* *the pattern wallet shown is similar to the one you will receive* *needles and notions not included*

name: Zip pouch - Winter Holiday - Knittin Mittens
description:
This is the pouch to hold all your knitting/crochet essentials inside your project bag! I use this size to hold my dpns, stitch holders, pencil, crochet hook (for repairing all my dropped stitches), stitch markers, tape measure, etc. In addition to holding your fiber related notions, this pouch is the perfect size for a variety of uses! Keep one in your purse to round up small/private items. Keep one in your sewing bag/case. Store your pencils/pens in one of these! Or, stuff your essentials in it before going out the door.

name: Pattern Wallet - *Deluxe* Full Size - Poe - MADE TO ORDER
description:
This item is MADE TO ORDER - Please allow up to 7 business days to ship What does "made to order" mean? Organizing shouldn't just be for needles & hooks! I wanted to keep my patterns neat & protected, while still easy to read. I was tired of my patterns becoming a wrinkled mess in my project bag - not any more! ~~This is a madbird original design!~~ These pattern wallets will hold paper in both US standard 8.5 x 11" and A4 with no resizing or folding necessary! This size pattern wallet is great for larger, more complicated patterns & charts. Our handmade pattern wallet/keepers have a large pocket "window" made of 12 gauge anti-glare vinyl so that you can view your pattern easily while keeping it protected on the go! No more crumpled up...and folded in fourths...patterns! No more rips. No loose papers floating around in your project bag!
  • folds in half and secures with a magnetic snap

  • fold back and snap open to prop up for easy viewing!
  • full size zip pouch sewn right into the wallet
    • keep your notions tucked securely in here! PLENTY of space! Folds completely out of the way when wallet is in use, and into the wallet when closed.
  • interfaced with extra firm stabilizer
    • nice and sturdy, yet still soft
  • approximately 9.5"x12.25" (24.13cm x 31.12cm) when open, 9.5"x 6" (24.13cm x 15.24cm) when closed

name: Mini Pattern Wallet - Evening Light - MADE TO ORDER
description:
This item is MADE TO ORDER - Please allow up to 7 business days to ship What does "made to order" mean? Organizing shouldn't just be for needles & hooks! I wanted to keep my patterns neat & protected, while still easy to read. I was tired of my patterns becoming a wrinkled mess in my project bag - not any more! ~~This is a madbird original design!~~ Our handmade pattern wallets have a pocket on either side - one clear vinyl, and one cotton. Print (or copy) your patterns on index cards or small paper to store them for travel. Keep the card you're working on in the vinyl side, store the rest of the pattern in the cotton pocket. Now you don't have to fold your patterns up to fit them in your project bag!
  • interfaced for stability and completely lined
    • they will prop up for viewing on some surfaces
  • super portable; they take up very little space in your project bag
    • your project bag is for your project after all!
  • clear anti-glare vinyl protects your pattern while you work
  • affordable and very cute!
  • 6.5" x 9" (16.51cm x 22.86cm) when open, 6.5" x 4.5" (16.51cm x 11.43cm) when folded

***IMPORTANT - PLEASE READ BEFORE PURCHASING A MINI WALLET*** If you intend on printing your patterns on 4x6 (10.16cm x 15.24cm) cards or paper, please be sure you're able to do so using your operating system before purchasing a wallet. We are unable to accept returns for mini pattern wallets after the standard 3 day return period as noted in our FAQ. Thank you!! If you need help printing your pdf patterns onto 4x6" index cards for use in this wallet, please use either of the following links: Mac Tutorial Windows Tutorial These tutorials are meant to aid you in printing patterns on 4x6" cards - assuming you have some basic computer knowledge. The processes described may not work for the specific software or operating system available to you. Technical help is not available. *fabric placement will vary* *the pattern wallet shown is similar to the one you will receive*
